name: Danmachi Ryuu Lion
description:
Introduction (Check Out Versions Before Downloading!)
This is my first LoRA. I barely know what I am doing. Pls don't be rude. It's based on the best girl Ryuu Lion from danmachi. I used various fanarts and anime screenshots in training. It's flexible and you probably won't get the classic look of the character due to training images. I recommend using the LoRA at 0.5-0.6. Also Clip Skip "2" is recommended but not necessary.

V2 Update:
This was trained differently with the same images. You can call the character only with "ryu, elf". You can also use detailed prompts like "ryu, 1girl, elf, blonde, short hair, wavy hair..." to get photorealistic results in models like chilloutmix. Though somehow the first model I randomly trained is better at photorealism in these models.

modelVersions.name: v3.0
modelVersions.description:
• Trained with more images.

  • Trained with different settings.

  • Better in general, will not give a fried look even if hit 1 weight.

  • Works better with a lot of models and styles compared to old versions.
